abstract: The Day: The jury in the trial of Barbara Sheehan found no incompatibility in sanctioning the battered-woman defense but not accepting that it took 2 guns and 11 bullets to make her feel safe. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: The jury in the trial of Barbara Sheehan found no incompatibility in sanctioning the battered-woman defense but not accepting that it took 2 guns and 11 bullets to make her feel safe. Also, what City Room is reading in other newspapers and...
lead_paragraph: In the 1991 film "Regarding Henry," Harrison Ford plays a total sleazoid who survives being shot in the head after he stumbles upon a store robbery. Before his misfortune, Mr. Ford's Henry Turner was despicable, a thorough bully at home and in his work. As he slowly recovers from his wounds, relearning to walk and talk, he becomes a man transformed. He is now caring and affectionate.

headline.main: Two Guns, 11 Bullets and a Jury Threading a Needle
